page.title: 15CHURCHES SEAHOUSES.
page.content: There are four churches in Seahouses. All of them to a larger or lesser degree serve the surrounding villages and farm communities. 1.CHURCH OF ENGLAND "St.Paul's"consecrated in 1834 and built on the site of a Pele Tower 84 Members on the Electoral Roll. 2.ROMAN CATHOLIC. "St.Aidan's" consecrated 1973. 86 members. Nearest other churches Alnwick and Lowick. 3.METHODIST. Consecrated 1926. 140 members. Nearest other churches Belford, Craster and Christon Bank. 4.UNITED REFORMED CHURCH. "ST.Cuthbert's." The minister is also responsible for churches at Embleton and Belford. Membership Seahouses 68, Embleton 42 and Belford 64.
